Name: Geometry Wars™ 3: Dimensions Evolved
About the game: Experience the full evolution of the award-winning Geometry Wars franchise and battle through waves of enemies on 3D grids in this frenetic arcade shooter! Geometry Wars 3: Dimensions Evolved includes all of the great content & features from Geometry Wars 3: Dimensions and more: Over 100 total levels including 40 all-new Classic game modes in stunning HD 15 3D grids including 5 all-new and 12 battle modes including Pacifism, King, Claustrophobia and 4 all-new modes 6 unique companion drones including Attack, Collect, Ram, Snipe, Defend and the all-new Sweep drone New “Hardcore” mode for Geometry Wars purists with no drones or supers and a separate leaderboard Cooperative and Online Competitive Multiplayer modes Community and Friend Leaderboards
